name: Summer Series at Trillium Park
description: City Hall Live will be returning to Trillium Park at Ontario Place for the third Summer Series Festival in partnership with the Province of Ontario on Sunday, August 24, 2 to 9 p.m. CHL will feature free, family-friendly programming at 2 p.m. with bands and dance lessons starting at 4 p.m.  Participants can enjoy a night of dancing under the stars, along with a bar onsite, food and artisan vendors.
image: https://secure.toronto.ca/webapps/CC/fileAPI/edc_eventcal/City of Toronto-Aug 11-24-Salsa Samba Night-Photos by Conor McSweeny-76-min (1)_z5KJJAaa0tBkZGjyRgQpUA.jpg

name: Whimsy Woods Fantasy Ball
description:
Step into the magical world of your favourite books. Come dressed to impress and join in for an evening of revelry and dancing! 

This event is for ages 19 and older.

name: Community Environment Day at Victoria Park Drop-Off Depot
description:
Help reduce the amount of waste going to landfill. Drop off household items for donation, electronics for reuse or recycling and household hazardous waste for proper disposal. Pick up free bagged compost while supplies last and kitchen catchers for organics ($7 each – cash, debit and credit accepted).

At Drop-Off Depot events, a safe motorized vehicle is required to drop off waste for disposal and all loads must be properly secured. Walk-ins, bicycles and manual transportation devices are not permitted. Any unsafe vehicles or unsecured loads will be refused entry.
